statements: SELECT * FROM drone_flight_data ORDER BY altitude DESC;
SELECT id, speed FROM drone_flight_data WHERE speed > 50;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM drone_flight_data WHERE altitude < 1000;
SELECT * FROM drone_flight_data ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, altitude, speed, latitude, longitude FROM drone_flight_data;
SELECT altitude, speed FROM drone_flight_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM drone_flight_data WHERE altitude > 1000 AND speed < 50;
SELECT longitude, latitude FROM drone_flight_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT altitude, speed, latitude FROM drone_flight_data WHERE altitude < 500 OR speed > 75;
SELECT * FROM drone_flight_data WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100;
SELECT * FROM DroneFlightData;
SELECT altitude, speed FROM DroneFlightData ORDER BY altitude DESC;
SELECT flight_id, latitude, longitude FROM DroneFlightData WHERE speed > 20;
SELECT flight_id, altitude, speed FROM DroneFlightData WHERE altitude BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT flight_id, altitude, speed, latitude, longitude FROM DroneFlightData ORDER BY speed ASC, altitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM DroneFlightData WHERE altitude > 100 ORDER BY flight_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT flight_id, altitude, speed FROM DroneFlightData WHERE altitude < 500 AND speed > 50
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM DroneFlightData WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100 ORDER BY latitude ASC, longitude DESC
SELECT d.flight_id, d.altitude, a.analysis_result FROM DroneFlightData d INNER JOIN DroneAnalysis a ON d.flight_id = a.flight_id WHERE d.altitude < 200 AND a.analysis_result LIKE '%OK%'
SELECT d.flight_id, d.altitude, d.speed, a.analysis_result FROM DroneFlightData d LEFT JOIN DroneAnalysis a ON d.flight_id = a.flight_id WHERE a.analysis_result IS NULL
SELECT * FROM DroneAltitude;
SELECT altitude, drone_id, timestamp FROM DroneAltitude ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM DroneGPS WHERE drone_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM DroneSpeed WHERE speed > 50;
SELECT AVG(altitude) as avg_altitude FROM DroneAltitude WHERE drone_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM DroneAltitude WHERE drone_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT drone_id, AVG(altitude) AS average_altitude FROM DroneAltitude GROUP BY drone_id;
SELECT drone_id, MAX(speed) AS max_speed FROM DroneSpeed WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT drone_id, latitude, longitude FROM DroneGPS WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-02 00:00:00' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM DroneAltitude a JOIN DroneSpeed s ON a.drone_id = s.drone_id WHERE a.altitude > 100 AND s.speed < 50 ORDER BY a.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM DroneInfo;
SELECT drone_id, altitude, longitude FROM DroneInfo WHERE altitude > 1000;
SELECT flight_id, flight_date, distance FROM FlightData WHERE duration > 30 ORDER BY flight_date DESC;
SELECT telemetry_id, drone_id, timestamp, temperature FROM TelemetryData WHERE temperature < 20 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT path_id, flight_id, latitude, longitude, altitude FROM FlightPath WHERE altitude > 500 AND speed > 50 ORDER BY flight_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM DroneInfo WHERE altitude > 100 AND speed < 50;
SELECT flight_id, flight_date FROM FlightData WHERE duration >= 60 ORDER BY flight_date DESC;
SELECT telemetry_id, timestamp, temperature FROM TelemetryData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT flight_id, latitude, longitude, altitude FROM FlightPath WHERE altitude < 500 ORDER BY altitude DESC, speed ASC;
SELECT d.drone_id, d.altitude, f.flight_date, f.duration FROM DroneInfo d JOIN FlightData f ON d.drone_id = f.drone_id WHERE f.duration > 120 ORDER BY f.duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM drone_flights;
SELECT id, altitude, speed FROM drone_flights WHERE altitude > 1000;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM drone_flights ORDER BY altitude DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM drone_sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT drone_id, battery_level, last_charged_at FROM drone_battery WHERE drone_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM drone_flights ORDER BY altitude DESC;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM drone_flights WHERE speed > 50;
SELECT drone_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM drone_sensors WHERE sensor_value >= 100 ORDER BY sensor_value DESC;
SELECT drone_id, battery_level, battery_health, last_charged_at FROM drone_battery WHERE last_charged_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM drone_weather WHERE weather_condition = 'Clear' ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity ASC;
